verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
O yes! I’m feasting on the manna from a bountiful supply,
For I am dwelling in Beulah Land.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Far away the noise of strife upon my ear is falling,
Then I know the sins of earth beset on ev’ry hand:

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Doubt and fear and things of earth in vain to me are calling,
None of these shall move me from Beulah Land.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Far below the storm of doubt upon the world is beating,
Sons of men in battle long
the enemy withstand:

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Safe am I within the castle
of God’s word retreating,
Nothing then can reach me’
tis Beulah Land.

verse.name: v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
Here the sun is always shining,
here there’s naught can harm me,
I am safe forever in Beulah Land.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Viewing here the works of God,
I sink in contemplation,
Hearing now His blessed voice,

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
I see the way He planned:
Dwelling in the Spirit,
here I learn of full salvation,
Gladly will I tarry in Beulah Land.
